body.raw:
From: tmpuser3@mydomain
To: recipient.acc@@cloud.appscode.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: multipart/mixed;
        boundary="XXXXboundary text"

This is a multipart message in MIME format.

--XXXXboundary text
Content-Type: text/plain

group works

--XXXXboundary text
Content-Type: text/plain;
Content-Disposition: attachment;
        filename="test.txt"

this is the attachment text

--XXXXboundary text--

item.name: Recomputing Global JMAP fast message view projection
View mailbox changes since last session
Show unseen threads containing a specific user
